meanings.definition: A person who is formally accepted as a member of an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The school welcomed new inductees to the student council.
meanings.sent2: The hall of fame ceremony honored the inductees for their achievements.
meanings.sent3: The inductees at the club meeting were greeted with cheers and applause.
meanings.sent4: Becoming an inductee into the prestigious society was a dream come true.
meanings.sent5: The inductees proudly wore their membership badges.

meanings.definition: The act of formally admitting someone to a position or organization.
meanings.sent1: The inductees' ceremony marked the official entry into the club.
meanings.sent2: The inductees were presented with certificates during the induction ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The inductees' initiation involved a fun and memorable ritual.
meanings.sent4: The inductees' acceptance speeches highlighted their gratitude and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The inductees' names were announced with great enthusiasm.
